price: Mu gihugu cyo hafi (y’Abaperise)[1]. Ariko nyuma yo gutsindwa kwabo na bo bazatsinda.
arabic: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ
footnotes: [1] Igihugu kiri hafi y’Abaperise iyo ntambara yabereyemo ni aho bita Al Jazira hagati y’umugezi wa Tigre na Euphrate muri Iraki. Kuri ubu Al Jazira ni mu bihugu bya Iraki, Siriya, Jordan na Palesitina.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: fī adnā al-arḍi wahum min baʿdi ghalabihim sayaghlibūna
